name: 2024 5th International Conference on Information Technology and Education Technology
content: Publicationï¼š All papers accepted will be recommended and published into journals, as below: Option 1: Journal of Advances in Information Technology (JAIT) (ISSN: 1798-2340 (Online); Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus (Since 2020), ESCI(Web of Science), EBSCO, Google Scholar, CrossRef, CNKI, etc. Option 2: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) (ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online); Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
